3    */
4   
5   package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
6   
7   import org.greatage.util.DescriptionBuilder;
8   
9   /**
10   * This class represents implementation of cache element for {@link SimpleCache} with element expiration logic.
11   *
12   * @param <V> type of cache items
13   * @author Ivan Khalopik
14   * @since 1.0
15   */
16  public class SimpleCacheElement<V> {
17  	private final V value;
18  	private final long creationTime;
19  	private final int timeToLive;
20  	private int readsToLive;
21  
22  	/**
23  	 * Creates new instance of cache element for {@link SimpleCache} with defined element value, time to live and reads to
24  	 * live.
25  	 *
26  	 * @param value	   cache element value
27  	 * @param timeToLive  time before cache item will be marked as expired and then deleted
28  	 * @param readsToLive number of reads before cache item will be marked as expired and then deleted
29  	 */
30  	public SimpleCacheElement(final V value, final int timeToLive, final int readsToLive) {
31  		this.value = value;
32  		this.timeToLive = timeToLive;
33  		this.readsToLive = readsToLive;
34  		creationTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
35  	}
36  
37  	/**
38  	 * Gets cache item value. It also increases element reads count.
39  	 *
40  	 * @return cache item value
41  	 */
42  	public V getValue() {
43  		if (readsToLive > 0) {
44  			readsToLive--;
45  		}
46  		return value;
47  	}
48  
49  	/**
50  	 * Checks if cache element is marked as expired. It marks as expired when it
51  	 *
52  	 * @return true if element is marked as expired, false otherwise
53  	 */
54  	public boolean isExpired() {
55  		return readsToLive == 0 || (timeToLive > 0 && creationTime + timeToLive < System.currentTimeMillis());
56  	}
57  
58  	/**
59  	 * {@inheritDoc}
60  	 */
61  	@Override
62  	public String toString() {
63  		final DescriptionBuilder builder = new DescriptionBuilder(getClass());
64  		builder.append("value", value);
65  		builder.append("created", creationTime);
66  		builder.append("timeToLive", timeToLive);
67  		builder.append("readsToLive", readsToLive);
68  		builder.append("expired", isExpired());
69  		return builder.toString();
70  	}
71  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
